short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens Gemini AI in Google Chrome's side panel

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features: 
👉 Productivity unlocked: No more tab juggling with Gemini AI in the side panel

👉 1-click access to AI: Get instant answers and insights right where you need them. 

👉 Ability to change the extension icon: Pick your favorite 

😎 Changelog/Updates:

v0.5.5: Fix for extension not loading on Windows 

Advantages:
- No more navigating away from your current page - simply access Gemini's insightful responses and creative text generation right alongside your content.


DISCLAIMER:
* Gemini and Chrome are a trademark or trademarks of Google LLC. or its affiliates. 
* This product is not created or endorsed by Google

🙏 Please leave a positive review if you enjoy this extension
If you have feedback, feel free to reach out to me (orlie@lf.gg)
